question: The theme of the 2017 International Day of Persons with Disabilities is:
option1: Decent Work for Persons with Disabilities
option2: Transformation towards sustainable and resilient society for all
option4: Making information technologies work for all
answer: Transformation towards sustainable and resilient society for all
explanation: The International Day of Persons with Disabilities is observed every year on December 3 to promote the rights and well-being of persons with disabilities in all spheres of society and development and to increase awareness of the situation of persons with disabilities in every aspect of political, social, economic and cultural life. The annual observance of the day was proclaimed in 1992 by a United Nations General Assembly resolution. The 2017 theme is "Transformation towards sustainable and resilient society for all".
